dcterms:creator: J. Salamon
D. MacConnell
M. Cartwright
P. Li
J. P. Bello
dcterms:description: URBAN-SED is a dataset of 10,000 soundscapes generated using the Scaper soundscape synthesis library. Each soundscape has a duration of 10 s, totaling 27.8 hours of audio with close to 50,000 annotated sound events from 10 sound classes.
dcterms:title: URBAN-SED

dcterms:creator: A. Mesaros
T. Heittola
A. Diment
B. Elizalde
A. Shah
E. Vincent
B. Raj
T. Virtanen
dcterms:description: The DCASE 2017 challenge consisted of four tasks, including one task with the same problem formulation as this work (training a model to generate strong predictions from weakly labeled training data), task 4: 'Large-scale weakly supervised sound event detection for smart cars'.
dcterms:title: DCASE 2017 Task 4

dcterms:creator: R. M. Bittner
J. Salamon
M. Tierney
M. Mauch
C. Cannam
J. P. Bello
dcterms:description: MedleyDB is a collection of 122 multi-track recordings from a variety of musical genres and styles, initially developed to facilitate pitch tracking evaluation, including time-varying instrument activation labels for each track.
dcterms:title: MedleyDB

dcterms:creator: J. F. Gemmeke
D. P. W. Ellis
D. Freedman
A. Jansen
W. Lawrence
R. C. Moore
M. Plakal
M. Ritter
dcterms:description: AudioSet is an ontology and human-labeled dataset for audio events, containing approximately 2 million 10-second YouTube clips with weak audio labels.
dcterms:title: AudioSet
